title: $500K Memorial Hospital and Manor Settlement Ends Class Action Lawsuit Over November 2024 Data Breach
description: A $500K Memorial Hospital and Manor settlement offers cash and medical data monitoring to those who may have been impacted by a Nov. 2024 data breach.

title: Nations Direct Mortgage Settlement Ends Class Action Suit Over December 2023 Data Breach
description: A Nations Direct Mortgage settlement offers cash and credit monitoring to individuals potentially impacted by a Dec. 2023 cyberattack.

title: $13.5M LexisNexis Settlement Ends Class Action Lawsuit Over Allegedly Wrongful Death Reports
description: A $13.5M class action settlement offers cash to those who LexisNexis FL may have allegedly reported as deceased when they were, in fact, alive.

title: $18M Yale New Haven Settlement Ends Class Action Lawsuit Over Data Breach Discovered in March 2025
description: An $18M Yale New Haven Health settlement offers cash and medical data monitoring to those who may have been impacted by a massive data breach.

title: $635K Heritage Federal Credit Union Settlement Ends Class Action Lawsuit Over Alleged Overdraft Fees
description: A $635K Heritage Federal Credit Union class action settlement offers cash to consumers allegedly charged certain overdraft fees.
